items.name: iPad 9th generation
items.line: All the essentials in the most affordable iPad.
items.description: A14 Bionic chip. Liquid Retina display. Works with Apple Pencil (1st generation) and Magic Keyboard Folio.

items.name: MacBook Air
items.description: 13' Retina Display, 8GB RAM. All-Day Battery Life – Go longer than ever with up to 18 hours of battery life.

items.name: iPhone 13
items.line: Love the power. Love the price.
items.description: The iPhone 13 display has rounded corners that follow a beautiful curved design, and these corners are within a standard rectangle. When measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 6.06 inches diagonally (actual viewable area is less). Super Retina XDR display. 6.1‑inch (diagonal) all‑screen OLED display. 2532‑by‑1170-pixel resolution at 460 ppi

items.name: Apple Watch SE
items.line: It’s the ultimate device for a healthy life.
items.description: Retina display. Up to 1000 nits. High and low heart rate notifications. Cycle tracking. Emergency SOS. International emergency calling. Family Setup — pair multiple watches with one iPhone

items.name: AirTag
items.line: Lose your knack for losing things.
items.description: Long live the battery. Splish, splash.
